name: AP_CLAIM_IF_SVC_HIPPS_RUG
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Interface Info - Svc - Pricer - Unadj Hipps Rate (I CLM 21397) item.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HIPPSRATE
columns.description: Unadjusted Health Insurance Prospective Payment System (HIPPS) Code Rate from incoming Skilled Nursing Facility (SNF) pricer using EasyGroup Prospective Payment System (PPS) Pricer.
